org.apache.kafka.common.metrics

Interface MetricsContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KafkaMetricsContext

    @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface MetricsContext
    MetricsContext encapsulates additional contextLabels about metrics exposed via a MetricsReporter The contextLabels map provides following information: - a _namespace field indicating the component exposing metrics e.g. kafka.server, kafka.consumer JmxReporter uses this as prefix for mbean names - for clients and streams libraries: any freeform fields passed in via client properties in the form of `metrics.context.= - for kafka brokers: kafka.broker.id, kafka.cluster.id - for connect workers: connect.kafka.cluster.id, connect.group.id
